Components.StoryCard.sure_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this story ?
Features.Editor.loading-asset-data-fail: the asset's data couldn't be loaded :(
Features.Editor.asset-type-image-help: import an image from your computer
Features.Editor.asset-type-video-help: import a video from an url (supported: vimeo, youtube)
Features.Editor.asset-type-data-presenta: import a quinoa data presentation made with bulgur
Features.Editor.asset-type-embed-help: paste custom html code to embed into the story
Features.Editor.asset-data-help: how to fetch the asset's content ?
Features.Editor.asset-metadata-help: it will be used to build solid & rigorous documents for material outputs and for indexation purposes
Features.ConfigurationDialog.what-is-you: metadata will help documenting your story and making it indexation-friendly
Features.ConfigurationDialog.apply-chang: apply changes and continue story edition
Features.StoriesManager.description-$1-g: Fonio is a tool aimed at building rich html pages featuring text and interactive assets helping to make an argument.
Features.StoriesManager.description-$2-f: Write your story, then save it locally or export it on the web on your personal spaces or on common servers.
Features.StoriesManager.about-forccast: Fonio is made in the frame of the FORCCAST project, a series of pedagogical experiments about the cartography of controversies, a new approach to socio-technical issues through simulation and web analysis.
Features.StoriesManager.about-medialab: Fonio was built at m√©dialab, a research center aiming at connecting social sciences to new digital tools and methods.
Features.StoriesManager.maximum-stories-: you have reached the maximum number of stories that can be stored on your browser, make some space if you want to create a new one !
Features.StoriesManager.or-continue-loca: ... or continue with a browser-stored story
Features.StoriesManager.import-project-f: ... or import a project from your computer
Features.StoriesManager.fetch-an-existan: ... or fetch an existant project from distant server
Features.StoriesManager.copy-paste-url-o: paste the url the of the project
Features.StoriesManager.your-file-is-bad: your file is not formatted properly
Features.StoriesManager.your-file-is-not: your file is not a valid story
Features.StoriesManager.the-url-did-not-: the url you provided does not point to a valid story
Features.StoriesManager.the-gist-is-not-: the gist is not formatted properly
Features.StoriesManager.you-seem-to-have: you seem to already have a version of this story stored on this browser
Features.StoriesManager.do-you-wish-to-o: Do you wish to override the browser-stored version of your story with the one you are trying to import?
Features.StoriesManager.override-existin: yes, override the existing browser-stored version of this story
Features.TakeAway.project-file-help: will download a project file, which allows you to re-import this story later or on another browser
Features.TakeAway.html-file-help: will download an autonomous html file that can be uploaded on any server
Features.TakeAway.gist-powered-website-h: gist is a service provided by the american company Github, it is aimed at storing light-weight code snippets. Choosing this option will allow it to use gist to publish your story online.
Features.TakeAway.forccast-website-help: forccast is the project at the origin of Fonio, led by SciencesPo university in Paris. Choosing this option will allow to store your story on SciencesPo's institutional servers and have it available on the web.
Features.TakeAway.your-story-is-online-o: your story is online on gist
Features.TakeAway.go-to-the-gist-source-: go to the gist's source code of your story
Features.TakeAway.go-to-the-gist-based-w: go to the gist-based webpage of your story
Features.TakeAway.embed-inside-an-html-w: embed the story inside an html webpage
Features.TakeAway.update-local-version-t: update local version to the repository
Features.TakeAway.the-online-version-wil: the online version will be overriden with your current version
Features.TakeAway.update-local-version-f: update local version from the repository
Features.TakeAway.your-current-version-w: your current version will be overriden with the distant version
Features.ConfigurationDialog.story-cover: upload an image to use as the cover of your story
Features.ConfigurationDialog.drop-a-cove: drop a cover image file here
